data.text: @1NewsNZ Death rate 0.026%. Time to #endmandates and open up our borders to everyone
@RickySt90188481 @1NewsNZ Laugh, now the stupidity is rife. 🤣🤣🤣😂😂😴😴😴😴

@TUMEKE_blog @1NewsNZ Oh, you’re just rambling now... wanting to blame the government for all sorts of thing, including whether Dr Bloomfield wore a black tie two year’s ago 🙄. That’s bordering on lunacy...

@TUMEKE_blog @1NewsNZ For example, Queensland has seen deaths rise from 7 before they had to open their state border, to 610 today. In a matter of 3 months, thanks to Omicron. At the start of February, 127 of 247 total Covid deaths had occurred in aged-care residents. Very sad!

@ScientistBlood @1NewsNZ Privacy about age? Circumstance? Not about surprising about suppression. Dehumanise the deaths by not reporting the facts - classic PR. Just before ANZAC Day 2020 five(?) died - all at aged care - veteran age ppl - he rocks in no black tie nothing and business as usual.

@TUMEKE_blog @1NewsNZ No, that’s a matter of privacy. It won’t be surprising if people in aged-care die, even if they’ve had 3 vaccine doses, because many of these people are frail or have complex health conditions that make them more likely to die if infected.

@TUMEKE_blog @1NewsNZ WHO and other sources still report death count from old system (see below). The new system, which includes virus-positive deaths where the cause of deaths is not yet known, brings the death toll up to 91. https://t.co/7rpxSxDlke

@ScientistBlood @1NewsNZ Reading between the lines they have been dropping like flies at age care facilities - just like last time. And just like last time Dr Bloomfield rocks up like it's just another day at the office. What are the ages, the circumstances? No names, no humanity, just stats - that's PR.

@TUMEKE_blog @1NewsNZ It went up... they are now capturing deaths in places like aged-care facilities (a huge number of these took place in Australia during their Omicron outbreak). This is a revision to be more accurate... always a good thing!
